summary: COIL PACK #2 FAILED UPON WARM START AFTER HAVING SAT FOR APPROXIMATELY 20 MINUTES. MIL WAS FLASHING INDICATING A SERIOUS PROBLEM. DROVE CAR ON THREE CYLINDERS LESS THAN 2 MILES TO HOME, AND CALLED VW CUSTOMER SERVICE  TO COORDINATE TOWING AND DEALER.    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS**770849
